# ----- Manage headers and footers:
#BottomLFooter: $Title$

BottomRFooter: "\\footnotesize Page \\thepage" # Add a '#' before this line to remove footer.
addtoprule: TRUE

# --------- page margins:
margin: 2.3 # Sides
bottom: 2 # bottom
top: 2.5 # Top
